# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- Initial MCP server structure
- `diagnose_rate_limiting` tool for API rate limit troubleshooting
- Project setup with modern Python packaging (pyproject.toml)
- CI/CD with GitHub Actions
- Comprehensive test suite with pytest-asyncio

## [0.1.0] - 2024-12-24

### Added
- Initial release
- MCP server skeleton with stdio transport
- First GTM engineering tool: `diagnose_rate_limiting`
- Basic project documentation

[Unreleased]: https://github.com/MathewJoseph1993/gtm-wizard/compare/v0.1.0...HEAD
[0.1.0]: https://github.com/MathewJoseph1993/gtm-wizard/releases/tag/v0.1.0
